game.name: The Innsmouth Case
game.shortDescription: The Innsmouth Case is a text adventure game inspired by H.P. Lovecraft and the very first text-based adventure to combine horror and comedy in a fit and proper way.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Innsmouth Case is a text adventure game inspired by H.P. Lovecraft and the very first text-based adventure to combine horror and comedy in a fit and proper way.

reviewHighlights.text: Comedic Lovecraft is very hard to pull of, The only game that managed to do, that I remember, is the point and click game Gibbous, that one was great....
"We understand the problematic beliefs of H P Lovecraft"? Wtf? What a parody is this, the statement and the game...
